name: Save 2020
description:
You embody an archer / hunter who was very calm living away from society when suddenly he was attacked by zombies.
Surprised he goes in search of his family and answers.

I can't tell more

You will have the courage to find out truly what is happening in the world and save your family.

  • From the dark forest to the dying city, traverse up to 10 worlds full of dangers.
  • Face zombies, monsters, dangerous creatures, dark soldiers, and most importantly, bosses that will make you go mad.
  • Upgrade your characteristics with each completed scenario until you became a true master of the bow and arrow.
  • It is a challenging game which will make you improve your skills, that is if you want to overcome the challenges that awaits you.
